name: datePart
description:
Extracts a part from a date value as a numeric.
 [datepart - quicky]
 yyyy: Year; q: Quarter; m: Month; y: Day of year; d: Day
 w: Weekday; ww: Week; h: Hour; n: Minute; s: Second;
 l: Millisecond

coldfusion.notes: Member function is available is CF11+.

lucee.notes: Member function is available is Lucee4.5+. The syntax for this member function is `date.part(datepart)`.

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.code:
datePart Example

Today's date is #todayDate#.

Using datePart, we extract an integer representing the dateparts from that value

  • year: #datePart("yyyy", todayDate)#
  • quarter: #datePart("q", todayDate)#
  • month: #datePart("m", todayDate)#
  • day of year: #datePart("y", todayDate)#
  • day: #datePart("d", todayDate)#
  • weekday: #datePart("w", todayDate)#
  • week: #datePart("ww", todayDate)#
  • hour: #datePart("h", todayDate)#
  • minute: #datePart("n", todayDate)#
  • second: #datePart("s", todayDate)#
